sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Container, Text, View, Image} from '../../atoms'


const Hero = ({title, subtitle, img}) => {

    return (
        <>
            <Container 
            isEqualWidth="100%" 
            isEqualHeight="100vh" 
            justifyContent="center"
            alignItems="center">
                <View flexValue="1" direction="column">
                    <Text >{title}}</Text>
                    <Text>{subtitle}</Text>
                </View>
                <View flexValue="1">
                    <Image src={img} />
                </View>
            </Container>
        </>
    )
}

export default Hero
